list_beasiswa.nama: ASUS Scholarship Program (For the admission to spring semester of 2023)
list_beasiswa.deskripsi: ASUS and the National Taiwan University of Science and Technology (Taiwan Tech) have launched a new Scholarship program for international students to pursue their education and plan for future careers in Taiwan. The ASUS Scholarship program offers master's programs for students in electronics, information technology, or management-related disciplines. ASUS scholarship recipients will be offered financial aid, opportunities to join internship programs and related job trainings by ASUS during the two year-masterâ€™s program. After graduation, a two year position at ASUS will be offered to scholarship recipients.
list_beasiswa.persyaratan:
• Hardware Engineer
  • Courses related to Circuits, Electronics, and Digital logic.
  • Power Engineer
  • Courses related to Circuits/Microelectronic Circuits/Electronics/Power Electronics; Paper: Power electronic/battery/ cell design or charger design
  • EMC/RF Engineer
  • Courses related to Microwave Engineering, Signals & Systems, Signal Integrity, Power Integrity, and EMC Compatibility.
  • 5G System Software Engineer
  • Knowledge of Telecommunication, Computer Engineering, Embedded systems, RTOS, Electronics Engineering, Software development, and Programming experience in C/C++.
  • Software Engineer
  • Compulsory subjects: Object Oriented Programming and Practice Data Structures Introduction to Computer Networks Computer Organization Operating Systems Programming Languages Software Engineering.
  • Additional requirements: The university is also for the Department of Information Engineering, and the project is written in C language.
  • Firmware Engineer
  • Compulsory subjects: Embedded System Design/Embedded Real-Time Operating System/Embedded Microprocessor Programming Local Area Network/Internet and Applications/Computer Communication Network Operating System Object-Oriented Programming
  • UX Designer
  • Courses in Qualitative Research Methods in Design and Digital Media Design are required.
  • The course in Psychology of Design is a plus.
  • Front-end Engineer
  • Courses in programming and computer science.
  • Courses in Web-related technical skills are a plus.
  • Both are fine in F2E web UI or headless APIs development.
  • Product Engineer
  • Course in Chinese, marketing, and economy.
  • Be familiar with Microsoft Office tools including Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. Expertise in other production APs (ex. Photoshop and OneNote) would be a plus.
